channel.title: [PI] Kree'arra animation fix?
channel.description:
I just fixed my godwars map (the black area). But I still have one problem left and that's the armadyl boss. It goes invisble when its at a part of the animation how can I fix this? I already looked in entityDef.java but the ints aren't there. So i'm guessing that this will have to be done server sided?
Thanks for the look I hope you can help me.
